text: Jean-Claude Narcy (born 16 January 1938) is a French journalist and news anchor. He has presented the daily news in the evening and at night on TF1. Narcy was born in Tours, Indre-et-Loire, France. Narcy was named Commander of the Legion of Honor in 2009.Arrêté du 10 février 2016 portant nomination et promotion dans l'ordre des Arts et des Lettres. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:French journalists Category:French television presenters Category:People from Tours
title: Jean-Claude Narcy
